sentences.en: By drilling, geologists can take measurements at various depths.
sentences.cn: 通过钻探，地质学家可以在不同深度测量。

sentences.en: He decided to leave school for various reasons.
sentences.cn: 出于种种原因，他决定辍学。

sentences.en: He frugally saved various bits of the machine in carefully marked boxes.
sentences.cn: 他厉行节约地把这台机器的各种零件放进仔细标记的盒子里收好。

sentences.en: His plan is to spread the capital between various building society accounts.
sentences.cn: 他打算把资金分散存到不同的购房互助会的账户上。

sentences.en: Lou prattled on about various trivialities till I wanted to scream.
sentences.cn: 卢就各种芝麻小事唠叨个没完，后来我烦得都想尖叫了。

sentences.en: Most of the women were hawking food around the various prisons.
sentences.cn: 其中大多数妇女在各个监狱周边兜售食品。

sentences.en: Specialists see various reasons for the recent surge in inflation.
sentences.cn: 专家们认为目前通货膨胀加剧有多种原因。

sentences.en: The idea met with a cool response from various quarters.
sentences.cn: 这个想法遭到了各方人士的冷遇。

sentences.en: The jacket is available in various colours.
sentences.cn: 这种夹克有好多种颜色可选。

sentences.en: The various elements of the novel fail to cohere.
sentences.cn: 这部小说的各部分之间缺乏连贯性。

sentences.en: There are various ways of shuffling and dealing the cards.
sentences.cn: 有各种不同的洗牌和发牌方式。

sentences.en: There are various ways to answer your question.
sentences.cn: 有多种方法可以回答你的问题。

sentences.en: These various complaints are part of a continuum of ill-health.
sentences.cn: 这些各种各样的疾病、不适都是身体健康状况欠佳的一种表现。

sentences.en: They've been living and working peacefully with members of various ethnic groups.
sentences.cn: 他们和不同民族的人们一起和睦地生活和工作。

sentences.en: They've linked her with various men, including magnate Donald Trump.
sentences.cn: 他们把她与不同的男人扯上关系，包括大亨唐纳德·特朗普。

sentences.en: This agreement is very ambiguous and open to various interpretations.
sentences.cn: 这份协议非常含糊，可以有多种解释。

sentences.en: Various men kept banging into me in the narrow corridor.
sentences.cn: 在这条狭窄的走廊上，不断有人撞到我。

sentences.en: Various textile techniques will be explored to realise design possibilities.
sentences.cn: 将尝试和探索纺织技巧来把这些设计变为现实。

words.tran_cn: 不同地；多方面地；个别地；多彩地

phrases.tran_cn: 各种款式；款式齐全；款式多样

trans.tran_cn: 各种各样的，千差万别的
trans.tran_en: if there are various things, there are several different types of that thing
